Posts.EditableText: Hi everyone hope all is well, I need a little help if possible please. I know that you can take or get an object using the [default behavior] and just ticking the object can be taken box. But just say that you want to run a script first and then you want to be able to get or take the object afterwards. What would be the syntax for it, or how could I do this. Thanks to all Terry

Posts.EditableText: Thanks Pertex for coming to my rescue once again I thought of a lot of complicated ways to try but to no avail. I never thought about that, however it works to a certain degree. When I type in get object it shows up in the panes on the side but when I type in inventory it does not show up in there. I am making this game without the showpanes showing. I hope this makes sense. Regards Terry and one for good luck

Posts.EditableText: Hi Pertex please let me know if you read this. I have sorted the problem out, your solution was obviously correct but I could not understand why it would not show up in the inventory. I tried various different ideas even to the point of duplicating the object and it still would not tell me that I had it in my inventory. Until I discovered that I had ticked the not shown in scenery box. Deerrrr what an idiot a simple thing like that caused me so much hassel. But once again thanks for all your effort. Terry and now i feel
Posts.HTML: Hi Pertex please let me know if you read this. I have sorted the problem out, your solution was obviously correct but I could not understand why it would not show up in the inventory. I tried various different ideas even to the point of duplicating the object and it still would not tell me that I had it in my inventory. Until I discovered that I had ticked the not shown in scenery box. Deerrrr what an idiot a simple thing like that caused me so much hassel. But once again thanks for all your effort.
